Package gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.namedstreams Description

This package contains implementation of named streams resources. The idea of named streams is not new. It remains strong in mainframe computing. According to this idea, files are declared in programs using logical names. The real filename that is associated with a logical name is given as input to the program.
This implementation of named streams also supports some other characteristics of mainframe programming, as fixed length records.
